categories: Category:Galactic Empire science and engineering personnel

nodes.text: An Imperial engineer worked on the Death Star project in the Maw installation during its final stages of construction, while Bevel Lemelisk received a bacta treatment after being choked by Darth Vader.

The engineer was a player's character in an online game Death Star Designer. Grand Moff Tarkin personally greets him and informs that the chief engineer Bevel Lemelisk suffered an "unfortunate near-fatal choking", thus making him the head of the project until Lemelisk returns.
